title: A Day with a Japanese family
creator_credit: Japan. Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Toei
brief_description: Depicts the daily life of an average Japanese family; shows their living conditions, problems, and the family relationships. The new Japan is improving living for the vast population and this film emphasises the benefits a family enjoys in the expanding industrial nation.
